name: Giant door
story: Standing in front of a giant door of the castle

name: entrance hall
story: It is guarded by two fierce-looking statues of dragons, their eyes glowing with a mysterious light.
nav: Press 1 to go to Banquet hall or 2 to go to Ballroom or 3 to go to Throne room

name: library
story: vast and labyrinthine room, filled with shelves upon shelves of ancient and dusty books.
nav: Press 1 to go to Riddle Room or 2 to go to entrance hall or 3 to go to Observatory

name: Throne Room
story: a grand and ornate chamber, with a high ceiling and a huge, gilded throne.
nav: Press 1 to go to Chamber of Shadows or 2 to go to Ballroom or 3 to go to Kitchen

name: Dungeon
story: dungeon is a dark and dreary place, with damp and crumbling walls. It is home to many dangerous creatures, such as giant spiders and venomous snakes.

name: Armory
story: This room is filled with weapons and armor. The player can collect new weapons and armor to help them in their quest.
nav: Press 1 to go to Dungeon or 2 to go to Treasure Vaultor 3 to go to Torture Chamber

name: laboratory
story: a shadowy and cluttered room, filled with strange and dangerous experiments.

name: Banquet Hall
story: a large, opulent room where the castle's inhabitants would hold feasts and banquets.
nav: Press 1 to go to library or 2 to go to entrance hall 3 to go to Ballroom

name: Observatory
story: This room is filled with telescopes and other astronomical instruments.
nav: Press 1 to go to Shrine or 2 to go to Coutyard 3 to go to Garden of Illusions

name: Chamber of Shadows
story: a dark and mysterious room filled with shifting shadows and hidden dangers.
nav: Press 1 to go to Halls of mirror or 2 to go to Treasury of the Dragon 3 to go to Fountains of Youth

name: Torture Chamber
story: a gruesome and horrifying room filled with medieval torture devices and the ghosts of their victims.

name: Hall of Mirrors
story: a vast chamber filled with hundreds of mirrors, each one distorting and tricking the player's vision.

name: Crypt of the Cursed
story: a dark and dusty chamber filled with ancient tombs and skeletons.
nav: Press 1 to go to Dark Tower or 2 to go to Torture Chamber  3 to go to Kitchen

name: Garden of Illusions
story: a beautiful but treacherous garden filled with deadly plants and enchanted fountains.
nav: Press 1 to go to Chapel or 2 to go to Fountains of Youth 3 to go to Hall of Mirrors

name: Treasury of the Dragon
story: a vast treasure hoard guarded by a fearsome dragon.

name: Fountains of Youth
story: a beautiful and tranquil garden filled with fountains that grant eternal youth to those who drink from them.

name: Courtyard
story: Outdoor space is surrounded by the castle's outer walls and filled with gardens, fountains, and other decorative features

name: Kitchen
story: a bustling and busy room filled with cooking fires and sharp knives.
nav: Press 1 to go to entrance hal or 2 to go to Chapel  3 to go to Kitchen

name: Ballroom
story: a spacious and elegant room with a polished wood floor and crystal chandeliers.

name: Chapel
story: a solemn and holy room with stained glass windows and a stone altar.
nav: Press 1 to go to laboratory or 2 to go to library 3 to go to Shrine

name: Shrine
story: holy and sacred place, guarded by powerful and benevolent spirits
nav: Press 1 to go to Armory or 2 to go to Dungeon 3 to go to Treasury of the Dragon

name: Riddle Room
story: a room filled with complex and challenging riddles that the player must solve to progress.
nav: Press 1 to go to Throne Room or 2 to go to laboratory 3 to go to Crypt of the Cursed

name: Dark Tower
story: tall and imposing tower filled with hidden secrets and deadly traps.

name: Treasure Vault
story: final room in the castle, where the treasure is hidden. The player must use all of their skills and abilities to overcome the challenges and obstacles in the room and claim the treasure

name: The outdoor garden
story: Final outdoor space, with a beautiful garden and a fountain at its center
nav: Press 1 to go to Dark Tower or 2 to go to Ballroom 3 to go to Dungeon
